Key Match Events: Clarke Schmidt gave up a two-run homer to Freddie Freeman with one out
Schmidt was unable to get out of the third inning against Los Angeles, done in also by four walks in just 2 ²/₃ innings before he was pulled with the bases loaded
Post-Match Reflections: Obviously, I didn’t do my job tonight
Schmidt said he couldn’t fix some mechanical issues in the third before getting removed
Miscellaneous Highlights: Schmidt walked Shohei Ohtani on four pitches to start the game
After getting Mookie Betts to fly to left, Schmidt gave up a two-run shot to right to Freeman
Schmidt needed 68 pitches to get just eight outs
